snippet.title: Caterpilla - VIC-20 Gameplay (Steam Re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1983, this was one of the very earliest releases from Ocean Software, which would go on to be one of Europe's biggest game developers and publishers of the 1980s/90s. Caterpilla is a simple riff on an arcade classic, released for the ZX Spectrum and Commodore VIC-20.

The deadly Caterpilla makes its way down the screen, weaving back and forth. Shoot it before it reaches the bottom of the screen. You will also need to contend with mushrooms that block the way, and a fearsome spider that will lunge at you!

This is the VIC-20 version of Caterpilla and the footage is from Pixel Games UK's Steam re-release, which also includes the ZX Spectrum version.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2244500/Caterpilla_SpectrumVIC20/

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #retrogames #retrogaming #vic20 #caterpilla #oceansoftware #ocean #pixelgamesuk #commodorevic20
